name: Anandvardhan Singh

experience.title: Product
experience.description: Expertise in: Product 0-1, Roadmapping, Growth, scoping, budgeting, design thinking, dev sprint planning, & leading agile teams using Kanban and Scrum Methodologies Quoality‚Ä¢ eDotCo: [Product Lead] scoping, design, development and delivery of a telecomm energy billing ERP for 24,000 sites, 1500 users, across Bangladesh and Malaysia ‚Ä¢ Yosaney.ai: [Product Manager] Led development for an AI platform that generates smart financial advices from SBI, HSBC, HDFC, ICICI and Citibank banking documentation for various MNCs and HNIs ‚Ä¢ TheHosteller(thehosteller.com):[Product Owner] design and development of end-to-end IT infrastructure including  website, admin panel, marketing and PMS(EZEE) integration, optimising sales and  operation channels increasing sales by 40%‚Ä¢ Flybig:[Product Manager] scoped, designed  and led development for the customer facing website and enterprise operations platform for an Indian Airlines. Integrations with third party PMS system APIs such as Paxlinks, Gupshup, and a robust system design on AWS.

experience.title: Co-Founder

experience.title: Head Of Business Development
experience.description: Overlooking the Business Development department of the single largest media body in this side of the country, proved to be an extremely fruitful part of my journey. Apart from running the show in a largely student-based community, it gave me a stage to deploy projects that had long been on my mind. Being the mind behind Noir Select, a Customer Loyalty Program working around a Eight-Figure Saving for the city served as an excellent proof of concept, of having a sound sense of business, along with reading the pulse of a market.

experience.title: Internship Trainee
experience.description: An apprentice under the project manager for L&T's Northen Railway Revamp undertaking served as an insight at the daily workings at the construction site of a railway bridge, apart from the tracks laid down. The technical knowledge I gained during my time working proves to be priceless in more than one aspect of my journey.

recommendations: Rupesh Gudmalwar ‚ÄúWorking with Anand as a Product Manager has been a transformative experience. He possess an extraordinary ability to envision the product's future while ensuring every step of development aligns with user needs and business goals. His strategic mindset, combined with a deep understanding of market dynamics, consistently leads to innovative, high-impact product solutions. Anand fosters collaboration across teams, driving exceptional outcomes with clarity, focus, and passion. A true product leader who not only delivers results but also inspires others to achieve their best. I highly recommend Anand for any organization seeking visionary product leadership.‚Äù
Muni Kiran Narpareddi ‚ÄúWorking with Anand was a great journey. He is an exceptional product manager, who knows how to handle things. He is a great mentor who knows his developers.‚Äù
